messages.message: Build mode seems to reset itself to the default classes determined by the platform when I re-open the solution.  I defined 3 classes + an “other” class and placed the docs within them.  I deployed my app in this configuration and the app config remained the same however when I click on “edit my app” (for customer demos), all of the changes I made including the prompts I created are gone & are back to the default determinations made by IB on initial doc upload:
Hi @Matt Macnak, thanks for flagging this! There is currently a fix in progress for this!
